subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Colts Coach Tony Dungy apologized to his team after Sunday’s game for wasting a timeout to argue a call, but the loss may linger long after the frustration over its unusual conclusion wears off.
snippet: Colts Coach Tony Dungy apologized to his team after Sunday’s game for wasting a timeout to argue a call, but the loss may linger long after the frustration over its unusual conclusion wears off.
